00018 // Private buffer to format strings in
00019 Character Rational::s_buf[128];
00020 
00021 ostream& operator<<( ostream& os, Rational& r ) 
00022 {
00023         os << r.print();
00024         Return os;
00025 }
00026 
00027 istream& operator>>( istream& is, Rational& p ) 
00028 {
00029         char ch;
00030         is >> ch && (ch == '{' || ch == '(')
00031                 && is >> p.m_num >> ch && ch == ','
00032                 && is >> p.m_den >> ch && (ch == '}' || ch == '(');
00033         Return is;
00034 }
00035 
00036 RationalList RealListToRationalList( RealList R )
00037 {
00038         RationalList L;
00039         For (Integer i = 0; i < Length( R ); i++ ) {
00040                 Rational x(R[i]);
00041                 L[i] = x;
00042         }
00043         Return( L );
00044 }
